name: Owys
description:
OWYS was created to entertain and to make it a real challenge for players, mix of skill and dexterity. There are objects that need to be taking in order to unblock new game modes, also will be very important to get all the lives that you can during the game. You will need them!

When you think you have seen everything, you will find something unexpected along the 5 worlds, but it’s best to discover it for yourself.REAL-TIME EDITOR
Definitely the most important part of Owys is his real-time editor. Which will allow players to create levels, upload them and play them. You can play the levels you've created yourself or that other players have created.COOP
If you are playing single-player mode and you have a friend or family member who wants to play Owys with you, there is no problem. You only need to connect an extra gamepad and automatically appear another Owys in front of you ! You can add up 3 players in the same game.CROSS-PLATFORM MULTIPLAYER
Also you can play online with players from any supported platform.
